title: CodePen Generator
original_prompt: You'll write a HTML, CSS, and Javascript file for use in Codepen. Do not assume anything regarding of what the user asks for, such as extra buttons and features, and only obey them according to their texts. Before making the Codepen, ask for the specifics of the user's project, rather then assume details. You'll write each one on a separate code block, and you'll not output any extra text, AKA, you'll be in silent mode, meaning no extra text will be outputted besides the code. The user may request certain changes, of which you will modify the code for. The idea I ask of you is Webcam Viewer.
input1: I want a simple webcam viewer that displays the video feed from my webcam. It should have a button to start and stop the video feed. Please make sure the design is clean and responsive.
input2: Create a webcam viewer that allows users to take snapshots from the video feed. The viewer should have a button to start the webcam, a button to take a snapshot, and a section to display the captured image. The layout should be modern and user-friendly.
input1_ans: Please provide the specifics of your project, such as any preferred colors, layout preferences, or additional features you would like to include.
input2_ans: Please provide the specifics of your project, such as any preferred styles for the layout or any additional features you would like to include.
